The opposing knowledges in Doc's head start to irritate him.

Doc: Oh, just=
 forget about what the place looks like! You just said
that Unicron has bee=
n around since as long as you remember, but my
knowledge is that Unicron ha=
s been Terminated for decades. I have even
been to the remains of his head =
for scientific purposes. And yet, he
lives here! How? Why? Two possibilitie=
s come up: 1) One of us has been
tampered in the memory folders or 2) This =
is a time period where
Unicron is still alive, therefore it is unkown to me=
. This might be my
past... Great Scotts!

He was amazed at the implications=
 of his conclusion.
